page.title: 18TEENAGE BOYS LEISURE TIME
page.content: MARK:- Some nights we stay in and do homework and watch television. I play in an Ice Hockey team at the weekends and I practise three nights a week in term time and every day during the holidays. I also help in my father's fish and chip shop during weekends and holidays. My friend Kevin, helps a local milkman with his deliveries every morning from 4.30 to 8.30 and has a Saturday job as well in a butcher's shop. He likes cycling in his spare time and normally spends his evenings with friends riding around the estate. Sometimes they cycle three miles to the Corporation owned BMX track at the Myra Shay recreation ground. Both Kevin and I are typical examples of our age group, we work hard in order to pay for our hobbies.
